content: dino nuggets crochet pattern pdf makes all 5 turn your yarn into your favorite prehistoric snack with this super cute dino nuggets crochet pattern this beginner-friendly pattern walks you through how to make five squishy dino-shaped nuggets all with a soft bumpy texture thanks to the treble_crochet bobble stitch whether you re crafting for laughs gifts or just because you love dinosaurs and snacks this pattern is pure crochet joy each nugget is made with cozy chunky chenille yarn and comes together quickly with easy-to-follow steps they re perfect for plushie collections playful decor or gifting to your fellow nugget lovers details skill level beginner makes 5 individual dino nuggets skills required single_crochet increase decrease magic_ring alternative treble_crochet bobble stitch materials & tools chenille yarn included in both the yarn option and supplies option scissors not included crochet hook included in the supplies option stuffing included in the supplies option 5 pairs of safety eyes included in the supplies option stitch marker included in the supplies option yarn details yarn weight chunky/bulky fiber content polyester color used sunset sorbet yellow orange download the free dino nugget crochet pattern today and start stitching up the cutest and cuddliest snack pack ever
